item.title: About
item.description: This site is a place for my to try to gather my notes into a coherent posts. â€ƒIn Nov. 2020, I completely switched to Linux, doing a step by step command line installation, and built up my GUI from scratch, having never actually used any Unix-like system before. This forced me to learn if I wanted to use my computer. Before this I was just a normal gamer, only knowing the basics of browsing and gaming.
